Iron shield
(Eternal)
Quality:
Type: Crafted
Slot: Secondary
Value: 236
Keyword: Shield
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

An iron shield that's heavy to lift, but you wouldn't want to use a light shield to withstand blows of your foes.

The Iron shield item is a crafted item.

Requirements

This item has no requirements to use it.

Attributes

Quality Attributes

This item has no attributes.

This item has no attributes.

This item has no attributes.

This item has no attributes.

This item has no attributes.

This item has no attributes.

Uses

This item may be equipped to your character.
